price: 8. ¡Y a cuántas poblaciones que desobedecieron las órdenes de Al-lah y de Sus mensajeros les hicimos rendir cuentas con severidad y les enviamos un terrible castigo!
arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ عَتَتۡ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهَا وَرُسُلِهِۦ فَحَاسَبۡنَٰهَا حِسَابٗا شَدِيدٗا وَعَذَّبۡنَٰهَا عَذَابٗا نُّكۡرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waka-ayyin min qaryatin ʿatat ʿan amri rabbihā warusulihi faḥāsabnāhā ḥisāban shadīdan waʿadhabnāhā ʿadhāban nuk'ran
translations: so We took it to account
